XenotypeDef.label: coastal merfolk
XenotypeDef.description: A hermit xenotype that comes from the ocean. Despite being fierce and graceful fighters in the water, they like to swim aimlessly and sing on reef rocks in hopes of finding a love for life. They are apparently a friendly race towards other humanoids, as many survivors of space shipwreck on ocean planets have reported being saved by coastal merfolks.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A hermit xenotype that comes from the ocean. Despite being fierce and graceful fighters in the water, they like to swim aimlessly and sing on reef rocks in hopes of finding a love for life. They are apparently a friendly race towards other humanoids, as many survivors of space shipwreck on ocean planets have reported being saved by coastal merfolks.

XenotypeDef.label: abyssal merfolk
XenotypeDef.description: The spiritual leaders of the merfolk people, young coastal merfolk sometimes visit them in the deepsea for their life advice. However, they are usually hostile toward non-merfolks as their habitat is scarce of resources. It is said they wield the power of rain with sea fret and storms being common in their presence.
